column1: # Based on Keio collection and PEC (Profiling of E. coli Chromosome) database
# Reference: Baba et al. (2006) Mol Syst Biol; Gerdes et al. (2003) J Bacteriol
# - gene_id: Gene identifier (matching model gene IDs)
# - minimal_glucose: M9 minimal medium with glucose (aerobic)
# - minimal_glycerol: M9 minimal medium with glycerol (aerobic)
# - anaerobic_glucose: M9 minimal medium with glucose (anaerobic)
